TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpPostClientProtocol extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.HttpSimpleClientProtocol

summary.span: The base class for XML Web service client proxies that use the HTTP-POST protocol.

span.span: The base class for XML Web service client proxies that use the HTTP-POST protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 XML Web 服务客户端使用 HTTP POST 协议，通过默认参数内使用 URL 编码规则的 HTTP 正文编码，并使用纯 XML 响应。When an XML Web service client uses the HTTP-POST protocol, by default parameters are encoded within the HTTP body using URL encoding rules and uses plain XML for the response. 此协议使用派生的类进行编码的参数和返回值到标准的 MIME 格式。This protocol uses classes that derive from to encode parameters and return values into standard MIME formats. 服务说明中指定要使用的编码器。The encoders to use are specified in the service description. 如果要生成的 XML Web 服务客户端，然后使用 ASP.NET，间接派生的代理类，或直接从需要为你想要调用 XML Web 服务创建。If you are building an XML Web service client using ASP.NET, then a proxy class deriving indirectly or directly from needs to be created for the XML Web service you want to call. 在 XML Web 服务客户端使用 HTTP 调用时，派生代理类，它又派生。When the XML Web service client is calling using HTTP, derive the proxy class , which in turn derives from . 并派生自，为调用 XML Web 服务方法分别使用 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 提供支持。 and derive from , providing the support for calling an XML Web service method using HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST respectively. 调用 XML Web 服务使用 SOAP 的客户端应派生自。Clients calling an XML Web service using SOAP should derive from . 生成代理类的详细信息，请参阅[创建 XML Web 服务代理](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/d2s8y7bs(v=vs.100))。For details on building a proxy class, see [Creating an XML Web Service Proxy](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/d2s8y7bs(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例是 Wsdl.exe 实用工具为生成的代理类`Math`下面的 XML Web 服务。The following example is a proxy class generated by the Wsdl.exe utility for the `Math` XML Web service below. 代理类派生自，又派生自抽象类。The proxy class derives from , which derives from the abstract class. [!code-cpp[Classic HttpPostClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpPostClientProtocol Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic HttpPostClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpPostClientProtocol Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpPostClientProtocol Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpPostClientProtocol Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下面的示例是`Math`XML Web 服务，从其创建以前的代理类。The following example is the `Math` XML Web service, from which the previous proxy class was created. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HttpPostClientProtocol Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpPostClientProtocol Example/CS/sourcecs.asmx)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HttpPostClientProtocol Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic HttpPostClientProtocol Example/VB/sourcevb.asmx)]

summary.span: Creates a instance for the specified URI.

span.span: Creates a instance for the specified URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写的基础版本来指定使用 HTTP POST 使对 XML Web 服务的 HTTP 请求。This method overrides the base version of to specify that the HTTP request to the XML Web service is made using HTTP-POST. 通过重写此方法，可以自定义对象，然后才能进行 XML Web 服务请求。By overriding this method, you can customize the object before the XML Web service request is made. 例如，可以将自定义标头添加到请求。For example, you can add a custom header to the request.

exception.span: The parameter is null or has a length of zero.

span.span: The parameter is null or has a length of zero.
